oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reid W. Dennis collection of California lithographs, 1850-1906
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This collection of prints, mostly lithographs (including chromolithographs and colored lithographs), as well as one engraving, primarily portray San Francisco city views, public buildings, and landscapes. Subjects also include San Jose, Stanford University, the U.S. Navy Yard at Mare Island, San Diego, and San Luis Rey. Included is a lithograph stone with an image of San Francisco.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Open for research; material must be requested at least 36 hours in advance of intended use.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gift of Reid W. Dennis, 2004, 2007, and 2013. Accessions 2004-095 (49 prints), 2007-076 (1 print), and 2013-143 (1 print)
